title: F1 2012 XBOX360-iMARS[EtGamez]
description:
[b]F1 2012 XBOX360-iMARS[EtGamez][/b]

[b]Description:[/b] F1 2012 is the next installment in the popular F1 racing series. The game features all new modes of play, including the Young Driver Test mode, a feature inspired by the sportÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s real-life testing programme for up and coming talent. The game will feature all twelve teams and twenty-four drivers competing in the 2012 season, as well as the twenty circuits Ã¢â‚¬â€ including the brand new Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas Ã¢â‚¬â€ included in the championship.

[b]Features:[/b]

- Features all the stars, cars and circuits from the 2012 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPÃ¢â€žÂ¢.
  
- The next game in the BAFTA award-winning series from Codemasters Racing Studios.
   
- Prove yourself in split-screen, co-op championships and online against 16 players plus 8 AI to simulate full 24 car grids.
   
- Debut ahead of the drivers at the new Circuit of The Americas, home of the 2012 FORMULA 1 UNITED STATES GRAND PRIX.
   
- Make race-defining strategy calls as localised weather dynamically changes circuit conditions.
   
- Test yourself against the greats Ã¢â‚¬â€œ take on six DriversÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ World Champions in dramatic racing challenges in Champions Mode.
   
- New Young Driver Test includes new tutorials to learn how to master motorsportÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most responsive cars.
   
- Can you hunt down glory in just ten races in Season Challenge?
   
- Use KERS and DRS for new attack and defence options Ã¢â‚¬â€œspeed past rivals and defend your line.
   
- Race wheel-to-wheel with stars like Sebastian Vettel, Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso.
